thread.title: Ronaldinho recalls the jaw-dropping moment which made him jealous of Dele Alli
thread.title_full: Ronaldinho recalls the jaw-dropping moment which made him jealous of Dele Alli

author: Mark Jones
title: Ronaldinho recalls the jaw-dropping moment which made him jealous of Dele Alli
text:
Not a bad person to be jealous of you... (Photo: Reuters / Getty images) Share   
As far as compliments go, then getting one from Ronaldinho must be a pretty big ego boost. 
And so with that in mind, then you've forgive Dele Alli for feeling pretty good about himself right now. 
Because, in an interview with Four Four Two, the Brazilian World Cup winner, ball-juggler supreme and one of the greatest players of his generation has singled out the Tottenham and England star for special praise. This man is a huge Dele Alli fan This is a pretty cool compliment, Dele (Photo: REUTERS) 
Alli is in wonderful goalscoring form this season, but it was his jaw-dropping strike against Crystal Palace last January which caught Ronaldinho's eye. 
And it even left the ex-Barcelona and PSG man jealous of the youngster. Remember this? (Photo: Reuters / Stefan Wermuth) He's waving again (Photo: Action Images via Reuters / Andrew Couldridge) 
"I saw Dele Alli’s goal last year and it looked like a goal I would like to score," he said. 
"There’s no explanation for goals like that. It’s very thrilling to inspire someone to such a great goal. I can barely put it all into words." 
You might want to print this one out and keep it, Dele. poll loading Is Dele Alli the best English player in the Premier League? 1000+ VOTES SO FAR
